title: WATCH: Emilia Clarke celebrates her birthday 50 Cent style
text:
Cape Town - The Game of Thrones star showed off her epic dance moves as she celebrated her 33rd birthday.

Emilia Clarke shared a hilarious clip of herself on her Instagram page breaking it down to 50 Cent’s classic birthday hit In Da Club – and we love it!

The actress, who turned 33 yesterday and is on a press tour to promote the movie Last Christmas, captioned the clip: “Says she loves pain aux raisin once. Not all that bothered. @lastchristmasthemovie press tour hooking me UP! #birthdaylikeaballer #?? #yesthereare33”

She started the day with a platter of 33 of her favourite pastries, pain aux raisin, and a bottle of champagne, the Daily Mail reports.

Dressed in a pale pink shirt and a maroon pleather skirt, the actress can be seen emerging from behind the delivery trolley with a bottle of bubbly in hand which she playfully pretends to drink. She then bursts out laughing.

As we write this, the post has received more than 5 million likes with fans from far and wide wishing her happy birthday.

Even former Friends actress Courtney Cox commented. “You’re literally the cutest girl I’ve never met. But want to!!! Happy Birthday!!” she commented.

SEE THE POST HERE:

(Sources:Instagram, Daily Mail)
description: The Game of Thrones star showed off her epic dance moves as she celebrated her 33rd birthday.
